=======
CHANGES
=======

0.6.1 (2015-09-28)
------------------

- removed bson dependency, pymongo uses it's own bson implementation


0.6.0 (2015-03-17)
------------------

- feature: replace internal method setContentType with setContentTypeAndEncoding
  and also set encoding if given.


0.5.0 (2013-11-23)
------------------

- initial release
